root.name: Family Circuit
root.description: OverviewPart of Konami's "Family" series of sports game, Family Circuit is a racing game. The player controls the vehicle from a top-down perspective, which had been getting marginalized by the then-popular behind-the-car perspective of games like OutRun.The player is able to customize their vehicles before races, editing acceleration and speed as well as their color scheme. They then compete in time trials and races with other vehicles, though as there is no vehicle collision in the game both modes play very similarly.
